parameters.help: Optional token that can be used to verify the webhook event is coming from ChatWork.
parameters.name: token
parameters.label: Token

GetRoom.name: GetRoom
GetRoom.label: Get a Room
GetRoom.description: Retrieves a room (groupchat room, direct message room or mychat room).
GetRoom.samplesJsonc:
{
	"room_id": 123,
	"name": "Group Chat Name",
	"type": "group",
	"role": "admin",
	"sticky": false,
	"unread_num": 10,
	"mention_num": 1,
	"mytask_num": 0,
	"message_num": 122,
	"file_num": 10,
	"task_num": 17,
	"icon_path": "https://example.com/ico_group.png",
	"last_update_time": "19 january 2010 16:20",
	"description": "room description text"
}

ListRooms.name: ListRooms
ListRooms.label: List Rooms

expect.help: The maximum number of results to be worked with during one execution cycle.
expect.name: page
expect.label: Limit

ListRooms.description: Retrieves all your rooms (groupchat room, direct message room or mychat room).

CreateRoom.name: CreateRoom
CreateRoom.label: Create a Groupchat

expect.help:
You have to add 'This account (current user)' to the room as Admin, Member or Read-Only Member.
If you add someone as admin and as member and as read-only, that person will receive the lowest permission (read-only in this case).

expect.label: Member Admin IDs

expect.help:
You have to add 'This account (current user)' to the room as Admin, Member or Read-Only Member.

expect.help:

MakeAPICall.name: MakeAPICall
MakeAPICall.label: Make an API Call

expect.help: Enter a path relative to `https://api.chatwork.com`. For example `/v2/rooms/188013895/tasks/169514389`
expect.name: url
expect.label: URL

expect.help: You don't have to add authorization headers; we already did that for you.
expect.name: headers
expect.label: Headers

MakeAPICall.description: Performs an arbitrary authorized API call.

SendMessage.name: SendMessage
SendMessage.label: Create a Room Message
SendMessage.description: Sends a message to a room.

WatchEvents.name: WatchEvents
WatchEvents.label: Watch Events
WatchEvents.description: Watches account events or room events.
WatchEvents.samplesJsonc:
{
	 "webhook_setting_id": "12345",
	 "webhook_event_type": "mention_to_me",
	 "webhook_event_time":"19 january 2010 16:20",
	 "webhook_event":{
		 "from_account_id": 123456,
		 "to_account_id": 1484814,
		 "room_id": 567890123,
		 "message_id": "789012345",
		 "account_id": "4759425",
		 "body": "[To:1484814]What do you like to eat",
		 "send_time": "19 january 2010 16:20",
		 "update_time": 0
	 }
}

ListRoomMembers.name: ListRoomMembers
ListRoomMembers.label: List a Room's Members

expect.help: The maximum number of results to be worked with during one execution cycle.
expect.name: page
expect.label: Limit

ListRoomMembers.description: Retrieves all the members of a room.
ListRoomMembers.expectJsonc:
[
	{
		"name": "room_id",
		"type": "select",
		"label": "Room ID",
		"mode": "edit",
		"options": "rpc://ListRooms",
		"required": true
	},
	{
        "help": "The maximum number of results to be worked with during one execution cycle.",
        "name": "page",
        "type": "uinteger",
        "label": "Limit",
        "default": 10
    }
]

UpdateRoomMembers.name: UpdateRoomMembers
UpdateRoomMembers.label: Update a Groupchat's Members

expect.help:
You have to add 'This account (current user)' to the room as Admin, Member or Read-Only Member.
If you add someone as admin and as member and as read-only, that person will receive the lowest permission (read-only in this case).
expect.name: members_admin_ids
expect.label: Member Admin IDs

expect.help:
You have to add 'This account (current user)' to the room as Admin, Member or Read-Only Member.
If you add someone as admin and as member and as read-only, that person will receive the lowest permission (read-only in this case).
expect.name: members_member_ids
expect.label: Member Member IDs

expect.help:
You have to add 'This account (current user)' to the room as Admin, Member or Read-Only Member.
If you add someone as admin and as member and as read-only, that person will receive the lowest permission (read-only in this case).
expect.name: members_readonly_ids
expect.label: Member Read-Only IDs

UpdateRoomMembers.description: Updates the members of a room.
UpdateRoomMembers.expectJsonc:
[
	{
		"name": "room_id",
		"type": "select",
		"label": "Room ID",
		"mode": "edit",
		"options": "rpc://ListAdminRooms",
		"required": true
	},
	{
		"name": "members_admin_ids",
		"type": "select",
		"label": "Member Admin IDs",
		"mode": "edit",
		"options": "rpc://ListContactsSelf",
		"multiple": true,
		"help": "You have to add 'This account (current user)' to the room as Admin, Member or Read-Only Member.\nIf you add someone as admin and as member and as read-only, that person will receive the lowest permission (read-only in this case)."
	},
	{
		"name": "members_member_ids",
		"type": "select",
		"label": "Member Member IDs",
		"mode": "edit",
		"options": "rpc://ListContactsSelf",
		"multiple": true,
		"help": "You have to add 'This account (current user)' to the room as Admin, Member or Read-Only Member.\nIf you add someone as admin and as member and as read-only, that person will receive the lowest permission (read-only in this case)."
	},
	{
		"name": "members_readonly_ids",
		"type": "select",
		"label": "Member Read-Only IDs",
		"mode": "edit",
		"options": "rpc://ListContactsSelf",
		"multiple": true,
		"help": "You have to add 'This account (current user)' to the room as Admin, Member or Read-Only Member.\nIf you add someone as admin and as member and as read-only, that person will receive the lowest permission (read-only in this case)."
	}
]
